headline: Is Stronger AI-Focused Earnings And Capital Returns Altering The Investment Case For Gen Digital (GEN)?
summary: In early February 2026, Gen Digital Inc. reported Q3 fiscal 2026 results showing higher sales and earnings year over year, affirmed a quarterly US$0.1250 per-share dividend for March 11, 2026, completed a US$703.32 million buyback of 27,000,000 shares, and received a stable outlook affirmation with a BB+ rating from Fitch. The company is increasingly centering its business on AI-powered security and financial wellness, highlighted by expanded Equifax and MoneyLion collaborations, the launch...
